channel.title: How Much Disk Space Does Salix Need :: Salix Documentation
channel.description: For the three different installation modes available, Salix occupies approximately the following amounts of disk space respectively: FULL: 2.4GB BASIC: 1.4GB CORE: 840MB So, depending on which installation mode you choose, you need to have a partition with at least that much space available. These sizes are the absolute minimum that youâ€™ll require. You have to account for any extra software you might want to install and of course for all your files.
